ResourceHeader.ResourceName: VENUS EXPRESS: ASPERA-4 IMA SWM Solar Wind Moments (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains solar wind parameters derived from ion data from the Ion Mass Analyzer (IMA).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator(s) as well as the ESA Planetary Science Archive and the CDPP (Centre des DonnÃ©es de la Physique des Plasmas) when making a publication using the data you are going to download.
Principal Investigator(s): S. Barabash (IRF, Kiruna, Sweden)

Parameter.Name: Quality flag
Parameter.Description: The flag parameter indicates:  0) No identified issues, 1) Bad fit, likely EUV or SEP contamination, 2) Too low temperature for the instrument to reliably resolve the Maxwellian 3) IMA was running in a badly suited Post-acceleration (PAC) level. 4) Solar wind observed in partially blocked FOV bin. 5) Solar wind density was smaller than 1 PART/CM**3. All entries are averaged from scan-wise moments with flag = 0, but the flag column is kept for possible future use.
